import "./style.scss" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { faCircleUser } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import axios from "axios" const Form = () => { const [userToken, setUserToken] = useState([]) const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm() const onSubmit = (data) => console.log(data) useEffect(() => { axios .post("http://localhost:3001/api/v1/user/login", { firstName: "Tony", lastName: "Stark", email: "tony@stark.com", password: "password123", }) .then((res) => setUserToken(res.data)) }, []) console.log(userToken.body.map((body) => body.token)) return (

Sign In

) } export default Form
